titleStmt.title: A Memorial of His Excellency the Earl of Avaux, extraordinary ambassador from the most Christian King delivered to the States General, concerning the false interpretation, made to be the meaning of his intercepted letter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Given at the Hague the 28 of Feb., 1684, and reprinted in London for Walter Davis ...,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: the volume in which this sheet is bound is bound tightly, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
